description.value: The secret society member has a few tricks most others do not. They gain two of the following skill feats: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Charming Liar]{Charming Liar}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Courtly Graces]{Courtly Graces}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Glean Contents]{Glean Contents}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Hobnobber]{Hobnobber}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lengthy Diversion]{Lengthy Diversion}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lie To Me]{Lie To Me}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Quick Coercion]{Quick Coercion}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Streetwise]{Streetwise}. If they are at least 2nd level, they can also choose from among the following: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Discreet Inquiry]{Discreet Inquiry}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Glad-Hand]{Glad-Hand}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lasting Coercion]{Lasting Coercion}. If they are at least 7th level, they can also choose @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Shameless Request]{Shameless Request} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Slippery Secrets]{Slippery Secrets}.
